Html:
Thank you for providing this application, I can see how it can be used in many different solutions.

My question is I like to dock the keyboard on the bottom of the application and prevent the drag/move functionality. Is there a way to do this ?

 

Hector

Yep, probably the easiest way is to grab the code and compile it into the app yourself. This gives you the full flexibility of creating your own custom keyboards etc.
